RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRISH FLIGHT exchanged contact with MOON FALL leaving the gate and raced in the four path the first turn, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, took the lead in the three path approaching the head of the lane and was kept alert to draw away the final sixteenth. The latter exchanged contact with Irish Flight leaving the gate and was bumped by JUBA'S MOCHA a stride later, rounded the first turn about the three path, left the turn outside and gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, came through the far turn in the three path and got up for second under the wire. JUBA'S MOCHA angled out and made contact with Moon Fall soon after the start then stalked from the three path, closed to the lead approaching the three eighths pole, was met nearing the head of the lane then nipped from second under the wire. LORD CLANCY took a slim lead at the rail at the nine sixteenths pole, was met and gave chase toward the three eighths, raced close near the rail on the far turn and was outfinished in the duel through the stretch. LUNAR GHOST angled in early and settled well off the pace, picked up the chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced in the five path on the far turn and passed rivals outside. COLONIAL ROAD saved ground, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but showed little response. TO THE TOP rated close inside on the first turn, was kept in check through the backstretch and offered no response on the far turn. SHINEY GHOST set the early pace off the rail but was met and gave chase leaving the nine sixteenths pole, dropped back toward the three eighths and faded readily.

ENTRY.NAME: To the Top
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close 1st turn,kept in hand backstretch,no response turn

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,4p 1st turn,bid 7/16,up 3p near 1/8,kept alert lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,chased 3/8,5p far turn,passed rivals outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALDRINALINE saved ground on the first turn, started a bid leaving the three eighths pole and raced in the four and five paths on the far turn, dug in from the head of the lane to get up later yards and drew clear nearing the wire. SIENTE EL AMOR rated close off the rail the first turn, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole and took the nod two deep approaching the head of the lane but was met passing the sixteenths pole and relented later yards. MODERN DAY ROMANCE was forced out then bore out into the first turn, picked up the chase leaving the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail but steadied at the heels of Charitable Windsor approaching the eighth pole and flattened the final sixteenth. OCEAN STORM came out a path into the first turn, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole and raced in the four path on the far turn, then flattened in the lane. CHARITABLE WINDSOR took over in the three path entering the first turn and rated the pace, came under pressure toward the five sixteenths pole, was met at the rail approaching the eighth pole and weakened the final sixteenth. WELL EQUIPPED saved ground racing well back, showed little response through the backstretch then angled to the outside leaving the far turn. MEETMARYSMAN showed little response. JEFFERSON SECURITY rated close inside on the opening turn then faded through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Aldrinaline
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid 3/8,4& 5p far turn,up late,clear near wire

ENTRY.NAME: Modern Day Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out,bore out 1st turn,chased 3/8,rail far turn,on heels1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 12700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 11, 2023. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REIGN ON AND ON pressured the pace and took the nod in the three path approaching the eighth pole, drew clear mid-stretch and was steadily handled to hold on well. GRANDIOSELY steadied at the break then gave chase, rounded the turn about the four path, drifted leaving the turn but finished well to take second later yards. SCARLET TANAGER gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the four path and dug in to take third the final yards. DING DING was hustled to the front leaving the half mile pole and set a pressured pace, contested the edge at the rail on the turn but was met toward the eighth pole and flattened from mid-stretch. MAKE IT A DOUBLE gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the four and five paths, left the turn outside and passed some rivals. ONE TOUGH ROSE chased through the backstretch, raced in the three path on the turn, angled out entering the lane and showed little more. SALSA RITA gave chase inside but flattened at the rail on the turn. SECRET AFFIRMATION was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Ding Ding
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibi lity).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AIR MEDAL settled off the pace about the four path, bid nearing the three eighths pole and took the lead in the three path midway on the far turn then only moderately urged in the lane. MARCUS JUNIUS raced in the six path early, bid nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path and settled for second best. MOON SIGN rated the pace inside, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, was met at the rail midway on the far turn and weakened. ONLY GET'N BETTER saved ground, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and showed little more. TYRY TYRANNOSAURUS rounded the first turn about the five path, moved to the inside afterward and gave chase leaving the half mile pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. I SEE NOTHING raced off the rail early on, picked up the chase leaving the nine sixteenths pole but showed little response. GET OFF MY CLOUD stalked the early pace about the three path then faded through the backstretch. FLINTSHIRE'S ROCK stalked the early pace from the three and four paths then faded leaving the second turn. LOVE MACHINE was taken up shortly after the start and walked off post race.

ENTRY.NAME: Air Medal
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p,bid 3/8,up 3p mid turn,held well,moderate urging

ENTRY.NAME: Flintshire's Rock
ENTRY.OWNER: Yellowstone Racing Stable and Radwin Racing Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUBBA G gave chase through the backstretch, raced in the three path on the turn, dug in for the lead mid-stretch and drew clear driving. DANCIN IN DUBAI gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn then eased out past the eighth pole and finished well to take second later yards. POLITICAL DECISION chased through the backstretch, raced in the four path on the turn, left the turn outside and finished well to take third the final strides. BRION took an immediate lead and set a pressured pace, contested the edge off the rail on the turn, but was met nearing mid-stretch and flattened stride later yards. TRAPPE THE GOLD gave chase, raced two deep on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. SPEIGHTS YOUR MIND gave only distant chase and saved ground into the turn. HUEY DUEY pressured the pace inside, raced at a close disadvantage nearest the rail on the turn and weakened inside the sixteenth pole. ADIOS SEE YA was unprepared and came away rank.

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin in Dubai
ENTRY.OWNER: Irish Hill Century Farm and McGuire Matthew
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,rail turn,eased out past 1/8,up 2nd late,finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Bubba G
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lantern Hill Farm LLC & Lighthouse Group LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Brion
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,edge off rail turn,met near 1/16,flattened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 12300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Three Races At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eli gibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DREAM OF BLESSINGS settled in the three path early on, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole and improved in the five path on the far turn, dug in for the lead mid-stretch and drew off later yards. MUD BUG settled off the early pace about the four path then saved ground, started a bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, took the lead two deep at the quarter, was met mid-stretch but held on for second. HE'S ON FIRE settled off the rail, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole and raced at the rail on the far turn, drew aim mid-stretch but flattened in the duel for second. CHROME HEIR raced in the four path the first turn then saved ground, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the six path and ran evenly in the lane. BLUE N GOLD raced off the pace about the three path, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the four path and showed little in the lane. VOLIERO rounded the opening turn about the five path, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole but weakened in the three path on the far turn. GABRIEL'S WING took the lead into the first turn and rated the pace, came under pressure toward the three eighths pole, was met at the rail at the quarter and faded. OILER rated close inside, gave chase leaving the half mile pole but faded past the five sixteenths.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue N Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Funkhouser III, Raymond J. and Funkhouser, John C.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p,chased 7/16,4p far turn,little in lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mud Bug
ENTRY.OWNER: Prostar 10 Stables Inc and The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc

RACE.RACE_TEXT: My Sister Pearl S. CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 85. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR REGISTERED ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. $50 nominations close Wednesday, November 1, 2023. $50 to enter with a purse of $75,000 Added. Entries close Wednesday, November 8, 2023 by the usual time of closin g. The added monies and all fees to be divided 60% to the winner, 20% to second, 11% to third, 6% to fourth, and 3% to fifth. Weight: Three Year Olds 121 lbs.; Older 123 lbs. Field will be limited to ten starters with up to four alternates. Preference tot hose horses having accumulated the highest 2022-2023 earnings at the time of closing of entries. Trophy to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMEDAY IS TODAY stalked off the rail, bid leaving the three eighths pole and took the nod between horses approaching the head of the lane, dueled clear past the eighth pole and drew off the final sixteenth. LUCKY BLONDE was reluctant to load then saved ground, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn, dug in under steady stretch handling and got up for second under the wire. NO DENYING DENIS raced in the four path early then saved ground leaving the seven eighths pole, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths, raced at the rail on the far turn, was eased to the four path into the lane then outfinished in the stretch duel for second. JUBASLILBALLERINA settled close in the three path, picked up the chase leaving the half mile pole and dueled to a slim brief lead three wide midway on the far turn, but was met entering the stretch and flattened late. MOONLIT SHADOW rated the pace inside, came under pressure leaving the nine sixteenths pole, was met at the rail midway on the far turn and weakened inside the eighth pole. SENECA ROCKS raced off the pace about the three path, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and ran evenly in the lane. AZZURRA raced off the early pace about the three path, left the second turn outside and gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the five path on the far turn and showed little in the lane. REVEIRS MINUTE rounded the opening turn about the five path then stalked two deep from the seven eighths pole, moved to even terms leaving the nine sixteenths pole but gave way toward the three eighths.

ENTRY.NAME: Moonlit Shadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 9/16,met rail mid turn,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Someday Is Today
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,bid 3/8,nod between near 1/8,cleared,drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Schiano Racing Inc. & Carpe Diem Syndicate

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Blonde
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant load,shuffled break,bid past 7/16,rail turn,up 2nd wire

ENTRY.NAME: Seneca Rocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p,chased 1/2,off rail far turn,evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARQUET CLASSIC took the lead nearing the three quarter pole and rated the pace inside, came under pressure toward the quarter, raced at the rail on the far turn and was steadily handled to hold on well. PUSH was shuffled back at the break and settled in the four path the first turn, bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the four path and dug in to take second the final strides. CHASING ARTEMIS rated close in the three path, gave chase toward the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and dug in under steady stretch handling, but was nipped from second the final strides. HONEYCAMP rated close off the rail the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn off the rail, eased out leaving the turn and finished evenly outside. HERECOMES SCARLETT stalked off the rail the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn. CHANNEL SCENT saved ground on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the six path on the far turn and showed little in the lane. DIAL FOR LOVE ducked out leaving the gate then raced in the three path the opening turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the five path and flattened stride. CRIMSON LILLE raced well back in the three path the first turn, moved to the outside into the backstretch and saved some ground on the far turn. HOLY HIP rated close inside on the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole then faded from the three eighths.

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Hip
ENTRY.OWNER: C M Racing Stables LLC and Lewis Jalen

ENTRY.NAME: Honeycamp
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close off rail,chased 3/8,off rail far turn,even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Marquet Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: up near 3/4,rated pace inside,pressured 1/4,rail turn,held well

ENTRY.NAME: Herecomes Scarlett
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,chased 3/8,flattened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Dial for Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out break,3p 1st turn,chased 7/16,5p far turn,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Push
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled break,4p 1st turn,bid 7/16,4p far turn,up 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing Artemis
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close 3p,chased 3/8,off rail far turn,nipped 2nd late
